message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product for $15000. It's a unique item that I think you'll really appreciate, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
Thank you for offering the product. I understand its value to you, but I am only able to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $12500. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value I place on the product.
